com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.datastage

Interface DataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF


  • public interface DataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF
    This interface allows customization when writing change data to flat files. If the user exit defined for the custom data format also implements this interface then these methods will be called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean assumeNoKeyChangesOccur(java.lang.Object context, java.lang.String subscriptionName, java.lang.String tableSchema, java.lang.String tableName)
      If this method returns true then before images won't be written for update operations.
      java.lang.Object getContextForDataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF(java.lang.String subscriptionName, java.lang.String tableSchema, java.lang.String tableName)
      This is called once for each table mapping, just before the first operation being processed by the apply for that table.
      java.lang.String getHardenedFileName(java.lang.Object context, java.lang.String subscriptionName, java.lang.String tableSchema, java.lang.String tableName, long fileStartTime, java.lang.String directoryName, int operationCount)
      Provide the fully qualified name to use for the hardened file.
      java.lang.String getTempFileName(java.lang.Object context, java.lang.String subscriptionName, java.lang.String tableSchema, java.lang.String tableName, long fileStartTime, java.lang.String directoryName, int operationCount)
      Provide the fully qualified name to use for the temporary file.

    • Method Detail

      • getContextForDataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF

        java.lang.Object getContextForDataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF(java.lang.String subscriptionName,
                                                                     java.lang.String tableSchema,
                                                                     java.lang.String tableName)
        This is called once for each table mapping, just before the first operation being processed by the apply for that table. The returned context object will be provided to all subsequent calls to the following methods: getHardenedFileName(Object, String, String, String, long, String, int) getTempFileName(Object, String, String, String, long, String, int) assumeNoKeyChangesOccur(Object, String, String, String) Note: the context object must be used in a thread safe manner by the other method calls. It is acceptable to return null for this if you don't need to maintain context.
        Parameters:
        subscriptionName - name of the subscription
        tableSchema - schema name of the table
        tableName - name of the table
        Returns:
        contextObject used for other methods

      • getHardenedFileName

        java.lang.String getHardenedFileName(java.lang.Object context,
                                     java.lang.String subscriptionName,
                                     java.lang.String tableSchema,
                                     java.lang.String tableName,
                                     long fileStartTime,
                                     java.lang.String directoryName,
                                     int operationCount)
        Provide the fully qualified name to use for the hardened file. This method will be called just before the file is to be hardened after all the data has been written to it. If the return value is Null then the CDC engine will follow its normal naming convention.
        Parameters:
        context - provided by the method getContextForDataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF(String, String, String)
        subscriptionName - name of the subscription
        tableSchema - schema name of the table
        tableName - name of the table
        fileStartTime - time when a flat file is created
        directoryName - directory to the flat file
        operationCount - number of operations in the flat file
        Returns:
        file name

      • getTempFileName

        java.lang.String getTempFileName(java.lang.Object context,
                                 java.lang.String subscriptionName,
                                 java.lang.String tableSchema,
                                 java.lang.String tableName,
                                 long fileStartTime,
                                 java.lang.String directoryName,
                                 int operationCount)
        Provide the fully qualified name to use for the temporary file. This method will be called just before the first data is to be written to this temporary file. If the return value is Null then the CDC engine will follow its normal naming convention.
        Parameters:
        context - provided by the method getContextForDataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF(String, String, String)
        subscriptionName - name of the subscription
        tableSchema - schema name of the table
        tableName - name of the table
        fileStartTime - time when a flat file is created
        directoryName - directory to the flat file
        operationCount - number of operations in the flat file
        Returns:
        file name

      • assumeNoKeyChangesOccur

        boolean assumeNoKeyChangesOccur(java.lang.Object context,
                                java.lang.String subscriptionName,
                                java.lang.String tableSchema,
                                java.lang.String tableName)
        If this method returns true then before images won't be written for update operations. The file will be written as if the Multiple Record option were selected with the Update Before Image rows not included regardless whether "Single Record" or "Multiple Records" are selected. Note: If any update operations change the key columns being used by the application consuming these files that application will not be able to maintain an accurate copy of the data. The method is called once per table mapping before the first operation being processed by the apply for that table.
        Parameters:
        context - provided by the method getContextForDataStageExtendedFileCharacteristicsIF(String, String, String)
        subscriptionName - name of the subscription
        tableSchema - schema name of the table
        tableName - name of the table
        Returns:
        true if the UPDATE BEFORE IMAGE is not to be written to the flat file.
